Class ViewController

java.lang.Object
controller.ViewController
public class ViewController extends Object
Controller responsible for managing the application's user interfaces (UIs).

The ViewController initializes all UI classes, controls window transitions, and manages the launching of game interfaces depending on the selected game.

It also provides methods for switching between windows, displaying UIs, and loading user data into the profile.

Since:
3.3
Author:
Davitroon

      public ViewController()

  • Method Details

    • initializeClasses

      public void initializeClasses(MainController controller, DatabaseManager dbManager)
      Initializes all user interface (UI) classes and links them with the main controller.

      This method creates instances of every UI window, passing the main controller to each, and initializes the home interface as the default screen.

      Parameters:
      controller - Reference to the application's main controller.
      dbManager - Reference to the DatabaseManager used for database operations.
      Since:
      3.0

    • openWindow

      public void openWindow(JFrame window)
      Displays a specific window (JFrame) on screen.
      Parameters:
      window - The window to make visible.
      Since:
      3.3

    • switchWindow

      public void switchWindow(JFrame currentWindow, JFrame newWindow)
      Switches from one window to another by hiding the current one and displaying the new one.
      Parameters:
      currentWindow - The currently visible window to hide.
      newWindow - The new window to display.
      Since:
      3.3

    • openGameWindow

      public void openGameWindow(PlayUI playWindow, Game game, Client client, double bet)
      Opens the appropriate game window based on the type of Game provided.

      Depending on whether the instance is a Blackjack or Slotmachine, this method initializes the corresponding game UI with the provided client and bet data, switches the view, and starts the game.

      Parameters:
      playWindow - The Play UI window from which this method is called.
      game - The game instance to be played.
      client - The client who will play the game.
      bet - The amount of money bet.
      Since:
      3.0

    • loadUserData

      public void loadUserData()
      Loads the current user's data and updates the Profile UI with that information.
      Since:
      3.3
